news.content: I will attend ACM MM 2024 in Melbourne, Australia. Welcome to have a chat with me at the conference!
One paper has been accepted by ACM MM 2024!
One paper has been accepted by ACL 2024!
One paper has been accepted by EMNLP 2023!
One paper has been accepted by ACL 2023 Findings!
One paper has been accepted by AAAI 2023!
